1.text: A Song of degrees.  Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:

2.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.

3.text: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.

4.text: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.

5.text: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.

6.text: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:

7.text: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.

8.text: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
